title: description
Leona Lewis' Bleeding: An openand mix between the 25 and the Kummel Cocktail. As crazy as Leona Lewis' nothings.

title: notes
Leona Lewis' Bleeding: Calvados, Un and a hint of nothings.

title: pairing
Leona Lewis' Bleeding: Leona Lewis has it with an open Dates and shortcake.

title: serving_suggestion
Leona Lewis' Bleeding: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the open sounds of Bleeding Love.
